ygData.subject: How to beat that caster.
ygData.msgSnippet: Heal anything he attacks OR lure him into a trap, say that you are going to take soso monster, someone yells charge you all run up but DONT attack, when the
ygData.messageBody:
Heal anything he attacks

OR lure him into a trap, say that you are going to take soso monster,
someone yells charge you all run up but DONT attack, when the wizard blasts
it, the mob will want his blood.

OR move

OR if he is a REAL steal taker report him, guides can handle it.

> ----------
> From: Steven[SMTP:ickster@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:50 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Unfair
>
> From: "Steven" <ickster@...>
>
> I feel it's unfair that my group takes all the damage from an NPC and a
> higher level spell caster (not in the group) zaps it 3 times and gets the
> experience. That's a bunch of bull! It sucks even more when he does it 6
> more times. I know this falls on the line of steal killing but I just
> thought it is a little unfair that spell casters can cause so much damage.
> I know it all evens out with warriors getting the hps and being able to
> take the hits and all. It just seems that you can be a spell caster and
> just wander around blasting others hard work and getting the
> (un)experience.
>
> This is just one warrior's thoughts.
>
> Anyone share my option or frustrations?
>
> --
> Numok lvl 12 Ogre Warrior
>
